DOC.brief_summary: Open label , single-arm phase II study avastin combine fluorouracil , doxorubicin streptozocin administer 28-day cycle . Treatment continue progression disease , withdrawal due toxicity , maximum 12 cycle ( 48 week ) . In order reduce risk cardiac toxicity , doxorubicin administer maximum 8 cycle . If disease progress 12 cycle treatment , avastin monotherapy continue disease progression withdrawal due toxicity .
